Articles.Content: Recently while playing KSP in Science mode, I noticed that when I went to the tech tree to unlock more stuff the blue button that you click to unlock it wasn't there. I tried clicking around and it still didn't work. I tried this with several different nodes in the tree and it still didn't work. I have enough science points and I have all of the prerequisite tech unlocked. I've included a screenshot of the screen when I'm having this issue.

It looks like the resolution you're playing KSP at is too low. Can you increase the resolution at all? 768px should be the minimum height, and as far as I know, that's the height everything works at... although from the looks of this, it might be 1024px minimum... I can't quite remember the exact number.
